item.title: Git Cheat Sheet
item.description: Git cheat sheet Cheat sheet with useful git commands. Whenever I find new necessary commands I will add them. Configuration related commands List the variables in the global git configuration file and their values git config --global --list Set your name in the global git configuration file git config --global user.name "Your Name" Set your email in the global git configuration file git config --global user.email "Your Email" Repository related commands Initialize a new git repository git init Initialize a new git repository and set the name for the initial branch to be created git init -b <branch_name> Commands related to commits Show the state of the working directory and the staging area git status Add one file to the staging area git add <file_name> Add multiple files to the staging area git add <file_name> <file_name> <file_name> Add all files to the staging area git add .
